mapper.select: SELECT APP_INFO_NO , OS , DEVICE_ID , APP_VERSION , LAST_ACCESS_TIME , REG_DT FROM CUST_APP_INFO WHERE DEVICE_ID = #{device_id}
mapper.update: update CUST_APP_INFO set LAST_ACCESS_TIME = now() where DEVICE_ID = #{device_id}
mapper.insert: insert into CUST_LOGIN_TOKEN ( CUST_NO, TOKEN, EXPIRED_DT, LOGIN_DT, REG_DT ) values ( #{cust_no}, #{token}, DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR), now(), now() )
mapper.update: update CUST_LOGIN_TOKEN set EXPIRED_DT = DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 1 YEAR) , LOGIN_DT = now() where CUST_NO = #{cust_no}
